name: Welcome To The Inn - China
description:
Welcome To The Inn!

You are the owner of a beautiful lake front inn located in southeast china. Your goal is to retire soon, so you must make as much money as possible before the time comes. It's up to you to hire workers, help clients, get rich, and have fun!

Are you up for the task?

Project made for the Autumn 2022 Game Jam - WIP.

This was a solo project that I spent about 5 days on. If you have any questions or ideas, feel free to make a comment and I will be sure to get back to them as soon as possible.
